TestDescription.name: WordPress plugin Slider Revolution arbitrary file disclosure
TestDescription.Description: The WordPress plugin Slider Revolution was vulnerable to an arbitrary file disclosure vulnerability that allows an attacker to download any file from the server. This vulnerability is/was actively exploited in the wild.
TestDescription.Impact: An attacker can download any file from the server.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of the plugin.

Reference.database: Slider Revolution Plugin Critical Vulnerability Being Exploited
